data.event_name: Luna Foundation Guard buys additional $1.5 billion in bitcoin backing for UST

news.title: Luna Foundation Purchases Additional $1.5B in Bitcoin to Bolster TerraUSD (UST) Reserve
news.text: The Luna Foundation Guard (LFG), a non-profit and the team behind Terra (LUNA) announced today that it has purchased an additional 37,863 bitcoins worth $1.5 billion to bolster its UST stablecoin reserve. 1/ The LFG has acquired an additional 37,863 Bitcoins totaling ~$1.5 billion in OTC swaps with @GenesisTrading and 3AC.

news.title: Terra's LFG Acquires $1.5B More Bitcoin—With 3AC's Help
news.text: The Luna Foundation Guard has bought another 37,863 Bitcoin.

news.title: Luna Foundation Surpasses Tesla As Second Largest Corporate Holder Of Bitcoin
news.text: Luna Foundation Guard has acquired an additional $1.5 billion of BTC, surpassing Tesla as the second largest corporate holder of BTC valued over $3 billion.

news.title: Luna Foundation Acquires $1.4 Billion in Bitcoin, Decentralized Reserve Stash Rises to 80,394 BTC
news.text: According to a report published on Thursday, the Luna Foundation Guard (LFG) explained that it acquired 37,863 bitcoin worth more than $1.4 billion through two over-the-counter deals. The LFG now holds 80,394 bitcoin in its reserves currently worth just under $3 billion using today's exchange rates. Luna Foundation Guard Scoops up 37,863 Bitcoin On May […]

news.title: Luna Foundation Guard Buys Another $1.5B in Bitcoin to Back Terra Stablecoin
news.text: “For the first time, you're starting to see a pegged currency that is attempting to observe the bitcoin standard,” said Terra co-founder Do Kwon.

news.title: Terra Buys Another $1.5 Billion Worth of Bitcoins, Stablecoin TerraUSD Enters Top Ten List
news.text: The Luna Foundation Guard, the parent organization behind the Terra blockchain, has purchased another $1.5 billion in Bitcoins. The recent purchase comes when Bitcoin (BTC) is down by 5% at press time and trading at around $37,000.

news.title: Luna Foundation Guard buys additional $1.5 billion in bitcoin backing for UST
news.text: The Luna Foundation Guard now holds $3 billion worth of bitcoin as reserve backing for the TerraUsD (UST) stablecoin. The post Luna Foundation Guard buys additional $1.5 billion in bitcoin backing for UST appeared first on The Block.

news.title: Luna Foundation Guard purchases additional 37,863 BTC as part of reserve strategy
news.text: The purchase, totaling roughly $1.5 billion, will be used to further backstop Terra Luna's UST stablecoin.

data.event_name: Bitcoin falls towards as stocks abandon Fed 'reactionary rally'

news.title: Bitcoin (BTC) Price Plummets 10% Following Sharp Decline on Wall Street
news.text: The Bank of England issued a warning on inflation on Thursday. 97% of the firms included in this S&P 500

news.title: Bitcoin craters 7% amid broader stock market sell-off, reinforcing its high correlation to risk assets
news.text: The back and forth between up and down days in bitcoin and the stock market partially deflates the argument that bitcoin is a hedge against inflation.

news.title: Bitcoin's price tumbles as much as 7% during financial markets tumult
news.text: Cryptocurrency prices fell across the board on Thursday, with bitcoin dropping as much as 7% — a move that came in tandem with a broader decline in financial markets. Bitcoin's price dropped down from about $39,500 at 9 a.m. ET to as low as $36,863.93 as of 1 p.m. ET, according to Coinbase data. At […] The post Bitcoin's price tumbles as much as 7% during financial markets tumult appeared first on The Block.

news.title: Bitcoin Falls to Two-Month Lows as Wall Street Panics about Threat of a Recession
news.text: After rallying toward $40,000 on Wednesday, immediately after the Fed announced it was increasing interest rates, BTC shed close to $3,000 in the space of three hours on Thursday.

news.title: Bitcoin price analysis: BTC breaks $37,500 previous low, finds support at $36,500
news.text: Bitcoin price analysis is bullish today as we have seen a strong drop below the previous low and support found at $36,500. Therefore, BTC/USD will likely soon reverse and retrace some of the loss.

news.title: Bitcoin price hits 10-week lows as $40K spike becomes 'nasty bull trap'
news.text: A full reversal and then some for BTC means that bulls are coming to terms with months of ground given up.

news.title: Bitcoin Drops 5% as Fed-Fueled Market Rally Fades
news.text: Following hawkish comments from the Fed, crypto and stocks alike have faced a serious bout of volatility over the past day.

news.title: Bitcoin Crashes Below $37K to 2.5-Month Low: Over $100M Liquidated In One Hour
news.text: Bitcoin reaches its lowest price in 2 months as the markets digest the Fed's 50 basis point rate hike on Wednesday.

news.title: First Mover Americas: Bitcoin's $40K Breakout Elusive as Fed-Inspired Dollar Drop Loses Steam
news.text: The latest moves in crypto markets in context for May 5, 2022.

news.title: Stocks Dive, Bitcoin Falls
news.text: The Powell rally did not last longer than an hour as much sudden green gave way to as much red this Thursday. The Nasdaq 3% gain is now a 3%.

news.title: Bitcoin falls towards $38K as stocks abandon Fed 'reactionary rally'
news.text: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq sees substantial losses on the day as Fed-induced gains evaporate.

news.title: As Bitcoin drops to its lowest ebb this year, are we looking at a continued bear market
news.text: The latest Glassnode weekly report suggests a picture of a potential bear market floor. With an increasingly desperate macro situation, Bitcoin dropped to its lowest ebb since mid-February.

data.event_name: Starbucks teases Web 3 Platform in NFT announcement

news.title: Blockacchaino: Starbucks to Release NFTs That Unlock Exclusive Perks — and Embrace Web3
news.text: The coffee brand says it believes NFTs have the potential to modernize loyalty programs — and they have compelling use cases beyond being traded "in a highly speculative way."

news.title: Starbucks to Launch NFTs With ‘Unique Perks'
news.text: The coffee chain claims that its digital collectibles would likely be chain-agnostic and will come with perks that are related to its physical locations. Starbucks Hints at a Web 3 Platform According to a company blog post published Tuesday, Starbucks…

news.title: Starbucks: ‘We Plan To Create a Series of Branded NFT Collections'
news.text: On Tuesday (May 3), American multinational coffeehouse chain Starbucks announced its plans for entering the Web3 era. Starbucks' blog post, which was written by chief marketing officer Brady Brewer and advisor Adam Brotman, started by talking about their concept of the “third place”: “While the ‘Third Place' has often been described in physical terms — […]

news.title: Starbucks Teases Web 3 Platform in NFT Announcement
news.text: The coffee chain says its digital collectibles will likely be chain-agnostic and come with benefits tied to its physical locations.

data.event_name: Dubai regulator buys land in The Sandbox to open virtual offices

news.title: Dubai's Regulator Will Open More Offices In The Sandbox Metaverse
news.text: Dubai's regulator will open more offices in the Sandbox metaverse space as we are seeing more in our latest cryptocurrency news. The Governemnt of Dubai is not planning on slowing down in its efforts to promote the development of the local industry and appeal to crypto enthusiasts.

news.title: Dubai regulator buys land in The Sandbox to open virtual offices
news.text: One of the leading regulatory bodies in Dubai, the Dubai Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority (VARA), has bought a piece of land in The Sandbox metaverse. [...]

news.title: Dubai, crypto regulator lands in Sandbox metaverse
news.text: VARA opens MetaHQ office

news.title: Dubai Regulator Will Open Offices in The Sandbox Metaverse
news.text: One of Dubai's regulators has just purchased its first piece of land in The Sandbox metaverse with the aim to open virtual offices.

news.title: Dubai's foray into Sandbox and sale of $1.47 million LAND reveals…
news.text: Even though The Sandbox might not be the biggest metaverse by market capitalization, it might just be the most popular and preferred metaverse given the entry of a government regulatory body. Dubai jumps in The Sandbox Following the trend as most of the other altcoins did, The Sandbox fell to its six-month low of $1.96 […]

news.title: Dubai Regulator Establishes Virtual HQ in the Sandbox Metaverse
news.text: Dubai is committed to growing the domestic digital asset sector, a local crypto regulator announced on Tuesday that it has created a virtual headquarters in The Sandbox metaverse platform.

data.event_name: Shiba Inu can now be used to purchase land in the Metaverse

news.title: Shiba Inu (SHIB) can be used to buy land in the metaverse
news.text: The Shiba Inu memecoin continues to gain more utility by the day. The memecoin will now be among the cryptocurrencies used to buy land in [.

news.title: Shiba Inu has a new use case — Buying land in SHIB: The Metaverse
news.text: Memecoin Shiba Inu can officially be used to purchase land in the SHIB Metaverse using the native SHIB token, as the development team continues to provide utility for holders.

news.title: $SHIB Army More Bullish on Shiba Inu Burn Portal than Metaverse, Poll Shows
news.text: The Shiba Inu ($SHIB) community seemingly supports token burns over its Metaverse as part of the project's long-term strategy, presumably believing a reduction in the currency's circulating supply is more beneficial than its Metaverse. According to polls conducted by Shiba Inu team member Archangel, first spotted by Gfinity Esports, SHIB community members believe that the […]

news.title: Land in Shiba Inu's Metaverse Can Now Be Bought With $SHIB
news.text: The team behind the meme-inspired cryptocurrency Shiba Inu ($SHIB) has announced users can now buy land within the project's metaverse with its native SHIB token. The move came after users requested the feature. According to a tweet shared by the project's official account, SHIB: The Metaverse, users can now mint land on the digital world […]

news.text: This, it says, was done based on community feedback

data.event_name: Tron spikes ahead of upcoming Stablecoin launch

news.title: TRON DAO and Other Blockchain Leaders Jointly Roll out USDD
news.text: GENEVA--(BUSINESS WIRE)--On May 5, Justin Sun, Founder of TRON, announced on Twitter that the TRON DAO Reserve rolled out a decentralized stablecoin named USDD, which has so far been listed on Sunswap, Sun.io, Curve, Uniswap, Ellipsis, Pancakeswap, Kyb...

news.title: TRON DAO promises to renew the user experience and launches the USDD project
news.text: • Red TRON offers higher custody for crypto stablecoin than ERC-20• TRON DAO offers low commission transactions with stablecoin Recently, the TRON Company and token creator Sun Justin announced the development of the USDD coin within the TRON DAO platform. According to reports, not only the technology firm will be involved with the token, but.

news.title: Tron's new algorithmic stablecoin USDD goes live
news.text: Tron's new algorithmic stablecoin USDD has officially gone live on the blockchain.   The post Tron's new algorithmic stablecoin USDD goes live appeared first on The Block.

news.title: Tron Spikes 6% Ahead of Upcoming Stablecoin Launch
news.text: Algorithmic stablecoin is scheduled to be issued and enter circulation on May 5

news.title: Tron (TRX) Breaks Out And Reaches New Yearly High
news.text: Tron (TRX) has increased by 35% over the past four days, breaking out from a four-month pattern in the process. The post Tron (TRX) Breaks Out And Reaches New Yearly High appeared first on BeInCrypto.

news.title: TRON (TRX) Prices Jump 11% On Stablecoin Hype
news.text: The TRON (TRX) token is the biggest gainer among top cryptocurrencies in the past 24 hours, ahead of the launch of a new stablecoin. The TRX token price has surged by over 11% in the last 24 hours.

data.event_name: Opera Crypto Browser users can now access BNB Chain Ecosystem dApps

news.title: Opera browser integrates BNB Chain bringing its 350M users to Web3
news.text: Popular internet browser Opera announced that it will integrate BNB Chain, formerly known as the Binance Smart Chain, into its crypto web3 browser. The post Opera browser integrates BNB Chain bringing its 350M users to Web3 appeared first on CryptoSlate.

news.title: Opera browser allows access to exciting BNB chain-based DApp protocol
news.text: The Opera browser has incorporated BNB Chain, a decentralized blockchain platform previously known as Binance Smart Chain, to allow BNB Chain-based decentralized apps on the Android, iOS, and Windows PC versions of its Crypto Browser. The incorporation will enable Opera's 350 million visitors to buy the BNB token with fiat, exchange it via Opera's built-in.

news.title: Opera browser integrates with BNB Chain
news.text: The Norwegian browser has now become a full-fledged crypto browser

news.title: Opera Enabled Direct Access To BNB-Chain Dapp Ecosystem
news.text: Opera enabled direct access to the BNB-chain dapp ecosystem and the new generation will allow users to access decentralized apps like 1Inch, BiSwap and PancakeSwap so let's have a closer look at today's latest cryptocurrency news. Opera integrated BNB Chain as a decentralzied blockchain ecosystem known as the Binance Smart Chain to enable BNB Chain-based […]

news.title: Opera Crypto Browser Users Can Now Access BNB Chain Ecosystem dApps
news.text: Opera Crypto Browser has added support for BNB Chain, enabling its more than 350 million monthly active users across the world to interact with decentralized finance (DeFi) solutions, and decentralized applications (dApps) and purchase the BNB token right from their…

news.title: Opera browser enables direct access to BNB Chain-based DApp ecosystem
news.text: New integration with BNB Chain allows Opera users to access decentralized apps, including DEXs like PancakeSwap, 1inch and BiSwap.

data.event_name: Binance commits $500M to co-invest in Twitter with Elon Musk

news.title: Binance to Help Finance Elon Musk's $44 Billion Twitter Acquisition Bid
news.text: A group of investors, including Sequoia Capital, Fidelity Group, crypto exchange Binance, Ellison, and others, have teamed up to fundraise money to back Tesla CEO's Elon Musk bid for Twitter at $44billion. Over $7 Billion Amassed to ‘Improve Twitter' Last…

news.title: Binance Invests $500 Million In Elon Musk's Twitter Acquisition.
news.text: Binance has been among the most successful crypto exchanges in recent years, with its competition grabbing headlines on a daily basis. The latest news about them is that they've joined forces to invest in Elon Musk's Twitter acquisition alongside firms like Sequoia Capital Fund and Fidelity.

news.title: Crypto Giant Binance To Invest $500,000,000 in Twitter Amid Elon Musk's Social Media Buyout
news.text: Leading crypto exchange Binance says it will invest $500 million into Twitter alongside billionaire Elon Musk, who purchased the social media platform for $44 billion last month. In a new blog post, Binance announced it is investing in the social media giant because they believe Musk's acquisition will help bring about the fusion of social […] The post Crypto Giant Binance To Invest $500,000,000 in Twitter Amid Elon Musk's Social Media Buyout appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

news.title: Top Crypto Exchange Binance Joins Musk's Twitter Bid, With Web3 in Its Sights
news.text: The world's largest crypto exchange, Binance, just backed Elon Musk's Twitter bid to the tune of $500 million. And that's just the beginning.

news.title: Elon Musk secures $7 bn in funding from Sequoia, Binance, and other investors to back Twitter bid
news.text: A group of investors, including Sequoia Capital, Andreessen Horowitz, Binance and Fidelity 89 has invested over $7 billion to back Elon Musk's $44 billion takeover of Twitter. The $44 billion deal that will see Twitter become a privately owned entity managed by Elon Musk's business entity was announced on April 25th, and Musk shared a tweet following the announcement, that spoke on free speech and how this forms the cornerstone of a “functioning democracy”.

news.title: Binance pledges $500m to Elon Musk amid Twitter takeover
news.text: Binance is the unlikely name on Twitter's list of newly acquired shareholders. Elon Musk's buyout of social media group Twitter has attracted $500 million in equity investment from Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange.

news.title: Binance Funds Elon Musk's Twitter Acquisition With $500 Million
news.text: Leading global cryptocurrency exchange Binance has joined the list of companies that have invested in the recent $44 billion acquisition of Twitter made by the Tesla CEO, Elon Musk. Binance Provides $500 Million The move was revealed in a Schedule 13D Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filing on Wednesday.

news.title: Binance Backs Twitter Takeover with USD 500m, Musk Could Serve as Interim CEO
news.text: The major crypto exchange Binance is backing Elon Musk's takeover of Twitter with a USD 500m investment, a public filing showed. Meanwhile, Musk might also serve as temporary CEO of Twitter once the takeover is done.

news.title: Binance Pledges $500M to Help Elon Musk Take Over Twitter
news.text: Binance was among a dozen firms helping Elon Musk finance his $44 billion Twitter takeover deal.

news.title: Bill Gates Warns Elon Musk Could Make Twitter 'Worse' — as Binance Invests $500M in Takeover
news.text: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, who has been doing a slew of media interviews for a new book, has given his two cents on Elon Musk's takeover.

news.title: Binance, 18 Investors Commit $7.1 Billion to Musk's Twitter Takeover
news.text: Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange in terms of daily trading volume, and 18 other equity investors committed over $7.1 billion to American billionaire Elon Musk's acquisition of Twitter.

news.title: Elon Musk Got $500,000,000 from Binance in Order to Buy Twitter
news.text: Elon Musk needed a hand to take over Twitter, and ties with crypto industry ended up being useful

news.title: Larry Ellison, crypto exchange Binance back Elon Musk's $44 billion bid to buy Twitter
news.text: The SEC filing, published Thursday, shows that Ellison is contributing $1 billion, while Sequoia is contributing $800 million.

news.title: Binance commits $500M to co-invest in Twitter with Elon Musk
news.text: Binance is among 18 co-investors in Elon Musk's Twitter acquisition alongside firms like Sequoia Capital Fund and Fidelity Management and Research Company.

news.title: Binance Backed Elon Musk's Twitter Deal With $500 Million
news.text: The Elon Musk-Twitter saga has had another turn, this time involving many giants, including Binance.

news.title: Binance Backs Elon Musk's Twitter Acquisition Bid With $500M
news.text: A recent SEC filing revealed that crypto exchange Binanace has backed Elon Musk's Twitter takeover bid to the tune of $500 million.

news.title: Binance to Invest $500 Million With Elon Musk in Twitter Takeover
news.text: Binance, the world's largest crypto exchange, appears to be among the parties proving Elon Musk with funding for his takeover of Twitter.  Recently Twitter had agreed to sell itself to Elon Musk for a roughly $44 billion deal as this would expand Musk's business empire. Now, interestingly, Binance, the largest crypto exchange has come up …

news.title: Breaking: Binance Provides $500 Mln To Elon Musk's Twitter Bid
news.text: Binance, the world's largest crypto exchange, appears to be among the parties proving Elon Musk with funding for his takeover of Twitter. The move was revealed in a filing by Musk to the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

news.title: Binance joins funding for Elon Musk's takeover of Twitter
news.text: The Tesla billionaire has agreed to pay $54.20 per share for the social media giant. The post Binance joins funding for Elon Musk's takeover of Twitter appeared first on The Block.

data.event_name: Binance commits $500M to co-invest in Twitter with Elon Musk

news.title: Binance to Help Finance Elon Musk's $44 Billion Twitter Acquisition Bid
news.text: A group of investors, including Sequoia Capital, Fidelity Group, crypto exchange Binance, Ellison, and others, have teamed up to fundraise money to back Tesla CEO's Elon Musk bid for Twitter at $44billion. Over $7 Billion Amassed to ‘Improve Twitter' Last…

news.title: Binance Invests $500 Million In Elon Musk's Twitter Acquisition.
news.text: Binance has been among the most successful crypto exchanges in recent years, with its competition grabbing headlines on a daily basis. The latest news about them is that they've joined forces to invest in Elon Musk's Twitter acquisition alongside firms like Sequoia Capital Fund and Fidelity.

news.title: Crypto Giant Binance To Invest $500,000,000 in Twitter Amid Elon Musk's Social Media Buyout
news.text: Leading crypto exchange Binance says it will invest $500 million into Twitter alongside billionaire Elon Musk, who purchased the social media platform for $44 billion last month. In a new blog post, Binance announced it is investing in the social media giant because they believe Musk's acquisition will help bring about the fusion of social […] The post Crypto Giant Binance To Invest $500,000,000 in Twitter Amid Elon Musk's Social Media Buyout appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

news.title: Top Crypto Exchange Binance Joins Musk's Twitter Bid, With Web3 in Its Sights
news.text: The world's largest crypto exchange, Binance, just backed Elon Musk's Twitter bid to the tune of $500 million. And that's just the beginning.

news.title: Elon Musk secures $7 bn in funding from Sequoia, Binance, and other investors to back Twitter bid
news.text: A group of investors, including Sequoia Capital, Andreessen Horowitz, Binance and Fidelity 89 has invested over $7 billion to back Elon Musk's $44 billion takeover of Twitter. The $44 billion deal that will see Twitter become a privately owned entity managed by Elon Musk's business entity was announced on April 25th, and Musk shared a tweet following the announcement, that spoke on free speech and how this forms the cornerstone of a “functioning democracy”.

news.title: Binance pledges $500m to Elon Musk amid Twitter takeover
news.text: Binance is the unlikely name on Twitter's list of newly acquired shareholders. Elon Musk's buyout of social media group Twitter has attracted $500 million in equity investment from Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange.

news.title: Binance Funds Elon Musk's Twitter Acquisition With $500 Million
news.text: Leading global cryptocurrency exchange Binance has joined the list of companies that have invested in the recent $44 billion acquisition of Twitter made by the Tesla CEO, Elon Musk. Binance Provides $500 Million The move was revealed in a Schedule 13D Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filing on Wednesday.

news.title: Binance Backs Twitter Takeover with USD 500m, Musk Could Serve as Interim CEO
news.text: The major crypto exchange Binance is backing Elon Musk's takeover of Twitter with a USD 500m investment, a public filing showed. Meanwhile, Musk might also serve as temporary CEO of Twitter once the takeover is done.

news.title: Binance Pledges $500M to Help Elon Musk Take Over Twitter
news.text: Binance was among a dozen firms helping Elon Musk finance his $44 billion Twitter takeover deal.

news.title: Bill Gates Warns Elon Musk Could Make Twitter 'Worse' — as Binance Invests $500M in Takeover
news.text: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates, who has been doing a slew of media interviews for a new book, has given his two cents on Elon Musk's takeover.

news.title: Binance, 18 Investors Commit $7.1 Billion to Musk's Twitter Takeover
news.text: Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange in terms of daily trading volume, and 18 other equity investors committed over $7.1 billion to American billionaire Elon Musk's acquisition of Twitter.

data.event_name: Gucci to begin accepting Bitcoin, Dogecoin and Shiba Inu in some stores

news.title: Designer DOGE: Gucci To Accept Dogecoin Payments In Retail Stores
news.text: Luxury clothing designer brand Gucci has announced that it will soon begin accepting Dogecoin payments in its retail stores. Dogecoin has been a formidable contender when it comes to the payments space due to it having not only a very large supporter base but also being a cryptocurrency with very low transaction fees.

news.title: Gucci plans to accept crypto payments in 111 US stores
news.text: Cryptocurrency payments have become increasingly popular over the past year, and brands that want to attract a new user base have been drawn toward these [...]

news.title: Gucci Opens Door To Crypto Payments
news.text: Luxury brand Gucci will be accepting payments in cryptocurrencies like BTC and DOGE in select stores later this month.  Buy Gucci With Crypto The initiative to accept crypto payments in select stores is a part of the fashion house's experiments in crypto.

news.title: Gucci To Accept Bitcoin, Crypto In Select U.S. Stores
news.text: The luxury brand is launching a pilot to accept Bitcoin payments in five U.S. locations, including New York, Los Angeles and Miami.

news.title: Gucci Joins Crypto Acceptance Craze, Will Launch 10-Currency Payment Program This Month
news.text: Luxury fashion brand Gucci will become the latest retailer to accept cryptocurrency payments when it launches the program in some U.S. stores at the end of this month and at all North American stores this summer, according to a company press release. Customers will make their crypto payments using a QR code sent to their […]

news.title: Gucci to Accept Bitcoin, Dogecoin and Shiba Inu at All U.S. Stores By End of the Summer
news.text: According to Vogue Business, customers who want to transact using crypto will be emailed a QR code — enabling them to complete a transfer from their wallet.

news.title: Gucci to Accept Crypto Payments in Some US Stores
news.text: Gucci is the latest luxury company to accept cryptocurrency payments, joining the ranks of other high-end retailers. Web3 efforts by Gucci have culminated in the brand accepting 12 cryptocurrencies in certain stores, with plans for a broader rollout in the…

news.title: Fashion giant Gucci to start accepting crypto payments
news.text: Italian high-end luxury fashion house Gucci is looking to add crypto as a payment option in some of its United States stores from late May, with plans to expand the pilot to all its North American stores by summer 2022. The post Fashion giant Gucci to start accepting crypto payments appeared first on CryptoSlate.

news.title: Renowned Luxury Brand Gucci to Accept Bitcoin, Ethereum Payments in the US
news.text: Italian luxury brand Gucci will accept crypto payments across five flagship stores in the US by the end of the month and aims to expand the pilot to include all of its directly-operated stores in North America by this summer.

news.title: Gucci Starts Accepting Bitcoin In Some Stores: Report
news.text: Gucci starts accepting Bitcoin in some of its stores and it is the latest luxury brand to start accepting crypto payments so let's read more in our latest cryptocurrency news. The Iconic fashion brand Gucci starts accepting Bitcoin in some of its stores in the US with plans to roll out a program to other […]

news.title: Gucci accepts Bitcoin and other crypto in some US shops
news.text: Italian luxury giant offers over 10 cryptocurrencies as payment methods

news.title: Gucci Opens Its Doors to Crypto Customers In The U.S.
news.text: Gucci, the popular Florence based Italian brand is making its way into the cryptocurrency industry. As VougeBusiness noted in a recent post, Gucci will be accepting cryptocurrency as a medium of payment in the United States.

news.title: $SHIB and $DOGE To Be Accepted for Payments at Several Gucci Stores by Month End
news.text: Italian luxury fashion house Gucci will reportedly accept crypto as a means of payment in several of its U.S. stores by the end of May, and it is planning to extend this program to all of its directly operated North American stores by the end of the summer. According to a report published by Vogue Business […]

news.title: Gucci to Accept Cryptocurrency Payments in US
news.text: The world-renowned luxury brand Gucci will accept cryptocurrency payments by the end of this month and plans to roll it out to direct-operated North American stores this summer.

news.title: Gucci set to accept crypto in five US stores
news.text: Gucci has announced that users across the United States of America can start paying with digital assets in some of its stores at the end of the month. According to the high-value fashion company, payment via the crypto channel will be open in five of its stores.

news.title: Shiba Inu and Dogecoin Now Accepted by Gucci
news.text: Gucci has started accepting several major cryptocurrencies, including meme coins and stablecoins

news.title: Gucci to Accept Crypto in Some US Retail Stores: Report
news.text: The Italian luxury brand plans to expand the payment mechanism across North America.

news.title: Gucci the latest luxury brand to accept crypto payments in store
news.text: Gucci's past efforts into Web3 have culminated with the brand accepting 12 cryptocurrencies at a few select stores, with a wider rollout planned for the future.

news.title: Gucci Will Accept Crypto Payments
news.text: Renowned crypto news site Watcher Guru recently tweeted that famous apparel brand Gucci is showing interest in cryptocurrency. Selected Gucci stores are going to experiment...

news.title: Gucci to Begin Accepting Bitcoin in Some Stores
news.text: Gucci is the latest luxury brand to begin accepting crypto payments.

news.title: Select Gucci stores to accept bitcoin, dogecoin and more as part of ongoing experiments in web3
news.text: Luxury brand Gucci will begin accepting crypto payments in select stores across the US later this month. The post Select Gucci stores to accept bitcoin, dogecoin and more as part of ongoing experiments in web3 appeared first on The Block.
